text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh, kunuu ansarana ldyn allh, kama kan asfya' eisaa ansarana ldyn allah hin qal lahum eysa: man yatawalaa minkum nsry w'ieanty fima yuqrrib 'iilaa allh? qalu: nahn 'ansar din allh, fahtdt taayifat min bani 'israyyl, wdllat tayft, fa'ayadna aladhin amanuu biallah wrswlh, wanasarnahum ealaa man eadahm min firaq alnsara, fa'asbahuu zahirin elyhm; wdhlk bbetht muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm
